We have over 30 years of experience building traditional and custom constructions, utilizing timber framing.

One of the biggest elements of timer framing is its jouinery — timber is joined together via mortises and tenons, and secured with wooden pegs.

Keep reading further to learn more about timber framing.

About

Founded in 1986, Sawdust Shamblesis a residential and commercial contractor. Some of the many services we provide but are not limited to are new construction, custom building, home building, garage building, renovations/remodels, roofing, siding, historical restorations and more.

If you have a a property with hardwood, we can build you a house/barn with your trees on the property.

Whether you're looking for help with a residential or commercial property, the experts at Sawdust Shambles are ready to give you the contracting assistance you need. Contact us to learn more.

Check our verified reviews on Angi.
